title: Great Sound Quality, Worth the Price!
review:
NOTE :- I got these at a discounted price of Rs.649/- 
------------
Pros - 
------------
1) Audio Quality is Great & Sharp.
2) Great Bass and Treble for Headphones this range.
3) Superb Built Quality. 
4) Very light & Fits Great.
5) Pricing 
-----------
Cons -
-----------
NO volume up/down switch! 
--------------------------
CONCLUSION :-
--------------------------
I was not expecting much from these because it only costed me Rs 649/- only, but i was amazed by the sound it produces. 
It's very clear and the bass is also very good on these considering the price point. 
I am a bass lover and I have to say that these matched the quality of SkullCandy Hesh 2 which are almost triple the price of these headphones. 

I tried these at full volume from my mobile and laptop and still the bass was good and no distortion. 
I would really recommend these considering its great price. :)

Cons-
NO volume up/down swith!

I would suggest you to buy this Headphone. Go for it!!!!!

Nice Headset,  I am not music expert, Bass 9/10, Treble 8/10, Music Clarity 9/10.

Even i am frequent buyer of flipkart since 2 years, i was doubtful regarding genuineness of the product. Many users reported they got the duplicate products when it comes to headset.

I have only trust on WS Retail, as they have delivered best results in the past. but have searched top end headphone and i am shocked to see that there are many sellers selling these premium headphones except WS Retail, therefore i decided to buy it from genuine store rather than flipkart.

title: Super!
review:
Just got these headphones yesterday and trust me i am not lying a bit, these are really awesome. I was very scared because of those negative reviews and stuff and comparisons to skullcandy, but after actually using this, i am so surprised. All those negative ratings are wrong or maybe they got faulty product. Here are some pros and cons for it :-
PROS-
1. Awesome bass. Loved it. Those who said that bass is not satisfactory and dont go for it if u are a music lover, please ignore. The bass is very pure and will suit almost anyone. I am a bass lover and mainly listen to EDM songs, and hearing EDM in JBL is just a charm :)
2.Nice treble alongside with the bass. No complaints in this price range.
3.some people reviewed that headphone loudness aint enough, dude it matters with what phone you are using. I am using redmi 4 and applied 'over the ear' settings in music options, and these headphones performance just boosted like hell.
4. Long wire cable, no issues.
5. That orange JBL logo looks quite awesome with the black background and are veryy stylish.
6. Comfort. The upper portion is having soft cushion for added comfort.
CONS-
1. Wires are thin, need to take care or you may damage them easily.
2. not foldable guys. U cant carry it in your bag or else it will break.
3. Yes it pains a little in the ear if u are using continuously for 2-3 hours. But thats not a major problem at all.
Thats it guys, couldnt find any other cons lol. Maybe my review helped you. Without thinking go for it and thank me later. Cheers :)

title: Good for base lovers
review: Bought this in flipkart. As usual got it delivered ahead of the said time. The pouch as given in the site is not included. The quality of the materials used looks/feels premium. good base. For those who want to hear the song as it is studio made it is a big irritant. Mild treble sounds are less audible or washed away by the intensified base. U get the feel of listening in a big home theatre or a movie theatre. No volume controller is another hitch. But overall its a good buy. it may not suit music lovers but sound lovers will like it.

title: good sound ..but very uncomfortable ..
review:
sound quality is good . ear piece is soft and the head band is nice and adjustable .. but size of the ear piece is equal to the ear so instead of covering your ear it will press onto your pinna .. quite uncomfortable after a period of 2 hrs of wearing ..

pros:
but product wise its good ,, sound quality good , wire is long enough and , 3.5 mm jack is coated gold and no loose contact .. 
price i got it on sale for 639
connects to all players phones and tablets

cons 
small ear piece 
uncomfortable to wear for longer duration
length of 3.5 mm jack is 5 cm unlike your ear phone whose 3.5 mm jack is 1 cm excluding the metal pin part .. 


on a 10 scale 
product quality built 9 /10
music quality  7/10
connection ease 10/10
comfort wise 3/10

title: Short Burning period
review: I bought after it was recommended by my colleague. Total value for money. Short burning period. Hopefully they won't wear out for a while. However the price seems to be fluctuating a lot. So if you see it at 899 i suggest you just add it to your cart!

title: Just Not the JBL I have expected
review: I have purchased it for Rs.699. Delivery was quick. But it wasn't any different from my previous headphone Logitech. It is comfortable to wear , but the sound quality is just not appealing enough to declare it a JBL Product. May be next time I buy something online, I'll try and do enough research before committing to it. 2 stars. 1 for the looks and comfort, as said in the description and another for the the 3.5mm gold plated pin or whatever you call that.

title: Worth every penny!
review:
So I got my JBL at a bargain of Rs. 799 last month even though it's cheaper right now. 
The audio, clarity & bass is perfect for a budget headphone and it does not look cheap at all. 

Pros:-
* Excellent audio
* Easy on your wallet
* Got it delivered in 2 days; good packaging
* Stylish
* Good ear support-covers the ear so outside noise isn't heard

Cons:-
* Even though the band is adjustable, it's too rigid and your ear hurts after maybe 30min of usage.
* It's wired so if you want it hassle-free, go for a wireless one.

On the whole, it's a well built product from JBL for every Indian.
Go for it if you don't use it for long hours.

title: Quite an average product. Doubt it is real JBL or not !
review:
Pros-

1. Great design and color.
2. Fits perfectly on head.
3. Good for listening music and watching movies.

Cons-

1. Bass not that upto the mark.
2. Sound quality not what actual JBL have.
3. Ears start paining within 15 minutes on wearing.
4. No microphone.

Suggestion - First I have a doubt if its a real JBL product or not. Secondly, the havoc made for this product is totally false as it doesn't have that great bass, sound and build quality. Honestly, telling it is just a average product in 700/- nor that great not that bad. One more thing flipkart have raised prices to 1049/- which i think is a wrong way of showing a product prices which it is not worth off. 700 should be the acceptable price not more than that.

i brought in 774 plus 100 addn charges.

2nd thing it doesn't hav Mic so purely for those who love music.
